name: Cancelled crew advanture Part 1
description:
Its your standard rpgmaker game with using the default RTP and trial version of the game this game was planned to have 5 Part this is part 1

4 villains i make in a sketchbook managed to turn digital with the artstyle machine the 10 Nembers of the cancelled crew (a group of assassins that wronged the 4 villains) need to go to a Rpg game to rule the world set somewhere near norway

They meet a weirdly modern doesn't like the gun they found in some shops

the 3 division the cancelled crew send are the resist division the madness division and the regular 1 division

with zero experience i manage to make a rpgmaker game in 20 days
